name: Gray Property Management

yelp_reviews.review: A lot of people complain about their property management company, and all I can say is thank god I rent from a kind family ran business. I have rented from them for six years now, and when ever I need something fixed they are on it. Although I can't contest to all of their properties, I can say that they are a friendly and trust worthy business.
